verses.name: Exodus 33:15
verses.text: And he said unto him, If thy presence go not with me, carry us not up hence.

verses.name: Exodus 33:16
verses.text: For wherein shall it be known here that I and thy people have found grace in thy sight? is it not in that thou goest with us? so shall we be separated, I and thy people, from all the people that are upon the face of the earth.

verses.name: Exodus 33:17
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Moses, I will do this thing also that thou hast spoken: for thou hast found grace in my sight, and I know thee by name.
